description: MLCommons Association artifacts, including benchmark results, datasets, and saved models.
name: MLCommons Association

resources.description: The MLCommons Association is a non-profit founded to "make ML better for everyone" through benchmarks, public datasets, and best practices. The MLCommons board has representatives from Alibaba, Google, GraphCore, Facebook, Intel, Qualcomm, Myrtle.ai, NVIDIA, and a Harvard faculty member, and the organization has over 50 members consisting of companies and academics.
